titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty of Triflusulfuron Methyl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/12/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1999, the duty on methyl 2-(((((4- (dimethylamino)-6-(2,2,2-trifluoroethoxy)-1,3,5-triazin-2-yl)-amino) carbonyl)-amino) sulfonyl)-3-methylbenzoate (triflusulfuron methyl).
